text:
@StephenKing We started two disastrous wars after the 9/11 terror attack which killed nearly 3000 people.
The total cost of those wars will probably be $3 trillion when all is said and done.
100,000 dead from COVID-19 and Trump calls that a success?
Throw this bum out !!!
